title: Cannot send outgoing email from Thunderbird desktop for Windows
content:
Using Thunderbird desktop for Windows with my Hotmail account, I frequently cannot send an outgoing email. I regularly get the following message even while successfully receiving incoming messages.

Send Message Error Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail: Outgoing server (SMTP) error. The server responded: Cannot connect to SMTP server 2603:1036:308:2817::2 (2603:1036:308:2817::2:587), connect error 10060.

I use Thunderbird for Android with the same email account without any issues. Any thoughts?
creator: jeffswan252
